actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To provide permanent duty-free entry for certain magnetic video tape recordings.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment to video tape recordings of a width not exceeding 16 mm, in cassettes of U.S. origin and valued at no more than $7.00 per pre-recorded cassette. Provides a duty on other types of video tape recordings.

titles.title: To provide permanent duty-free entry for certain magnetic video tape recordings.
